intent_atoms.description: Provide big-endian decoding helpers for RandomAccessReader to support 32-bit, 64-bit, and FourCC values with error reporting on short reads.
Introduce a FourCharCode value type and BoxHeader model representing header metadata including payload range and optional UUID.
Implement BoxHeaderDecoder.readHeader to handle standard, largesize, uuid, and zero-sized boxes while validating parent/file bounds.
Decoding helpers must report an error when the read length is shorter than required for 32-bit, 64-bit, or FourCC values.
BoxHeaderDecoder.readHeader must correctly parse standard boxes with size and type fields.
BoxHeaderDecoder.readHeader must parse large-size boxes (i.e., large size field).

functional_units.name: Big-endian decoding helpers
functional_units.description: Provides methods in RandomAccessReader to decode 32-bit, 64-bit, and FourCC values from big-endian byte streams with error handling for short reads.

functional_units.name: FourCharCode value type
functional_units.description: Defines a value type representing a FourCC (four-character code) used in box headers.

functional_units.name: BoxHeader model
functional_units.description: Represents metadata of a box header including size, type, optional UUID, and payload range within the file.

functional_units.name: BoxHeaderDecoder.readHeader method
functional_units.description: Decodes a box header from a RandomAccessReader, handling standard, largesize, uuid, and zero-sized boxes while validating bounds against parent or file limits.

functional_units.name: XCTest suite for Box Header Decoder
functional_units.description: Unit tests covering nominal and malformed headers, as well as helper behavior for decoding functions.
